name: Example Form 1
description: This is an example form (or leave this description empty)
responseChannel: discord channel id where the form responses will be sent

questions.question: This is an example of a short answer question. You can add as many questions as you want.

questions.question: This is an example of an paragraph answer question.
questions.placeholder: Multi line response, paragraphs allowed. (or leave it empty)

questions.question: This is an example of a dropdown/select menu question.
questions.placeholder: You can only select one option from the dropdown

choices.name: This is the second choice. (add up to 25 choices)

questions.question: This is an example of a question with buttons.

choices.name: This is a button choice.
choices.color: gray OR red OR green OR blue

choices.name: Another button.
choices.color: gray OR red OR green OR blue

choices.name: And another button. (add up to 25 choices)
